authTestAcc.remarks:
Username and password are the same.
See all username/passwords:
Administrator Manager Stock Seller Public
Username admin manager stock seller public
Password admin manager stock seller public
Route parameter {user} accepts both the name or the number of the test user enum:
See enum values
Administrator,
Manager,
Stock,
Seller,
Public
Example (both URLs authenticate the same user):
https://localhost:5001/api/v1/auth/authenticate/testAccount/1 https://localhost:5001/api/v1/auth/authenticate/testAccount/Administrator
